comment.body: Unlimited *low* speedðŸ˜‚. I would suggest getting a cheap seedbox instead.
@Musickiller: Sounds quite busy to me, good luck then.

A workaround is to use a burner phone, e.g. a cheap Android phone, which connects to the internet by SIM card, and then share the internet by wifi tethering. In this way, the IMEI compromised is only that burner phone. Further, if you really need to hide/secure internet access, get Tor browser with bridges.
